summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing financial investments involving the FTC and other entities. It mentions specific amounts invested and the nature of the investments, while also indicating the confidential nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing financial investments.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein regarding financial matters.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email to Jes Staley on September 23, 2010.
The email discusses a total investment of 41 million dollars involving the FTC and other entities.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email mentions specific amounts invested: 15 million, 10 million, and 10 million.
There is a note about interest calculations in a lawsuit that are assumed to be irrelevant.
